score: 0 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Shrek is one of my favorite childhood movie. The first movie is the best movie, I think. Then comes the fourth, second, & then third which I don't like & I haven't seen the entire thing yet and don't plan on it either.I think shrek is a funny, great movie for the family to see. It has comedy for everyone.The best character is donkey. The funny, loyal, annoying, talkative adorable best friend.I also love how they include all the other fairy tales in this movie and how they kind if make fun of them all to.
